app.installation_instructions: Install the app from the Zendesk marketplace. Then click on the icon in the left nav bar to finish the installation.
app.long_description: Use deep learning from Hashback to automate classifying new tickets. With a system that gets smarter the more you use it, you can automate priorizing, tagging, and determining type and sentiment for all newly created tickets.
app.name: Hashback

token.helpText: API Token for your Hashback account. This will be set automatically for you and shouldn't need to be changed.
token.label: Hashback API Token

app.short_description: Use deep learning to automate analyzing new tickets
